title: My homemade muesli
ingredients: ['4 cups (porridge) oats', 'a handful of toasted almonds', 'a handful of chopped toasted hazelnuts', 'a handful wholewheat flakes or crumbled whetabix', '2-3 tablespoons puffed rice', '1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '1 tablespoon agave syrup', 'Anything else you might like: millet, sesame or sunflower seeds, etc.', 'For after baking: raisins, sultanas, dates and any other fruit']
